title: Automatic Code Assist inserting incorrect code
description: While writing SWT code, I type the following: button.dispose. At this point, I do not realize that the code assist list is up because I am not looking. There are 2 items in the list now: DISPOSED and intWidgetdispose(). I then type '(', expecting the line to be button.dispose();, but as soon as I type '(', the automatic code assist seems to insert whatever is selected.
SR:
Build 204

While writing SWT code, I type the following: button.dispose. At this point, I do not realize that the code assist list is up because I am not looking.
